code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Publication=_ref=>{let{title,authors,journalConference,doi,description,keywords,youtubeUrl}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"publication",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Authors:"})," ",authors.join(', ')]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Journal/Conference:"})," ",journalConference]}),doi&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"DOI:"})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:doi,style:{color:"#268bd2"},children:doi})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Description:"})," ",description]}),keywords&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Keywords:"})," ",keywords.join(', ')]}),youtubeUrl&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"video-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("iframe",{width:"100%",height:"auto",src:"https://www.youtube.com/embed/".concat(youtubeUrl),title:title,frameBorder:"0",allow:"accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture",allowFullScreen:true})})]});};export default Publication;
